title: Uploading .txt data
body:
How to reproduce the behaviour
---------
<!-- Before submitting an issue, make sure to check the docs and closed issues and FAQ to see if any of the solutions work for you. https://github.com/chakki-works/doccano/wiki/Frequently-Asked-Questions -->

<!-- Include a code example or the steps that led to the problem. Please try to be as specific as possible. -->

Your Environment
---------
<!-- Include details of your environment.-->
*   Operating System: Mojave 10.14
*   Python Version Used: 3.7
*   When you install doccano: 10/8/19
*   How did you install doccano (Heroku button etc): git clone


When trying to upload a .txt file, I am able to upload the following:

Discussed motivations to cont smoking vs motivations to quit we agreed on goal to cut back to 5 day over time increase aerobic exerciseFU for cont counseling discussed diet exercise must quit smoking today
defers statin
trial
test text
anotther test

however, this does not work:


Discussed motivations to cont smoking vs motivations to quit we agreed on goal to cut back to 5 day over time increase aerobic exerciseFU for cont counseling discussed diet exercise must quit smoking today
defers statin
trial
epa dha rechk 3 mos
1/8/13 Discussed
Lipids ordered and will inform1

test text
anotther test


Is there any information on what format is accepted for the text input option?
